text: Thippaji Circle is a 2015 Indian Kannada drama film written and directed by Aditya Chikkanna. The film stars Pooja Gandhi and Suresh Sharma in the lead roles. The supporting cast features Bhavya, Neha Patil and Dhruva Sharma. The movie narrates the life of a devadasi, Thippava (Pooja Gandhi), and is based on a novel by B. L. Venu. Venu also wrote the film's dialogues, for which he earned an award at the 2014 Karnataka State Film Awards. == Cast == ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Baranishree and released by Lahari Music. ==References== Category:2010s Kannada-language films Category:2015 films Category:Indian drama films Category:Indian films Category:Films featuring an item number Category:2015 drama films
title: Thippaji Circle
